name: Vrodex Booking Widget
author: Vrodex

sections.description:
Integrate the Vrodex Booking Widget effortlessly onto your website and transform visitors into customers. Setting it up is a breeze – all you need is your external API key from your Vrodex account.

Our widget boasts a sleek, modern design that prioritizes minimalism, ensuring lightning-fast loading speeds without sacrificing functionality. With its clean interface, users can seamlessly navigate the booking process, resulting in high conversion rates and satisfied customers.

Don’t miss out on maximizing your website’s potential – install the Vrodex Booking Widget today and streamline your booking experience like never before.

  • Available in English, French and Dutch
  • Responsive design
  • Support customisations
  • Accept payments
  • Seamless integration
  • Fast, secure and safe
  • 24/7 Support from Vrodex

Before using the plugin please have a look at our Terms and Conditions here and our Privacy Policy here.
sections.faq:
Is Vrodex free?

Yes, Vrodex offers a free trial period of 14 days. Following this trial, you have the option to upgrade to one of our paid plans. You can find more information about our pricing on our website here.

Do i need a Vrodex account?

Yes, in order to manage your reservations effectively, you will need to create a Vrodex account. Signing up is simple and free! Just visit our website here for more information and to get started.

Questions or comments?

Please send an email to support@vrodex.com and we will get back to you shortly!
